name: 愛して飼い主
summary:
☆Description
What would it be like to be the pet of a lovely good looking guy!?
With this application you can experience it!
It's a new kind of "love-application"where you can enjoy the voices of many famous Japanese voice-actors!
He will stroke you, feed you, play with you... live a while as sweet and weird lovers with him!

☆About the drama CD "Pet-love" series
Wondering how it would feel like to be a pet of a good looking guy? 
These CD's give a completely new experience through famous japanese voice-actors. 
As a pet, you can get the best flavour of an unconditional love!
info:
• 开发: Visualworks
  • 别名: Love me, I'm your pet darling
  • 平台: iPhone、iPod Touch
  • 游戏类型: 乙女向全年龄 娱乐
  • 发行日期: 2012年05月18日
  • 官方网站: http://www.fwinc.co.jp/pet/
  • 版本: 1.2
  • 大小: 18.6 MB
  • 语言: 英语, 日语
  • 开发商: © Visualworks Co., Ltd.
